channel.title: 华尔街日报
channel.description: 这是一个追踪华尔街日报news的种子

item.title: 黎巴嫩真主党民兵向以色列北部发动了自加沙战争开始以来最猛烈的炮击，尽管美国努力制止跨境炮火
item.description:
Lebanon’s Hezbollah militia launched its heaviest barrage on northern Israel since the war in Gaza began, despite U.S. efforts to halt the cross-border fire https://t.co/SjcvdRBqes https://t.co/SjcvdRBqes

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 12, 2024

item.title: 来自@WSJopinion：@gerardtbaker写道：值得反思的是，为什么在众多国家中，以色列为生存而战的权利却受到广泛争议？
item.description:
From @WSJopinion: It’s worth reflecting on why, singularly among nations, Israel’s right to fight for its survival is widely disputed, writes @gerardtbaker https://t.co/V5DO01WtH4 https://t.co/V5DO01WtH4

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 12, 2024

item.title: 球员锦标赛有一个尴尬的问题--它缺少了一群世界上最好的球员
item.description:
The Players Championship has an awkward problem—it’s missing a bunch of the world’s best players https://t.co/4vIHaSQUkx https://t.co/4vIHaSQUkx

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 12, 2024

item.title: 来自 @WSJopinion：禁止 TikTok 应该是最后的手段，但 ByteDance 和中国政府已经证明他们不可信。有证据表明，中国政府可以利用该应用在美国进行网络间谍和政治影响活动。
item.description:
From @WSJopinion: Banning TikTok should be a last resort, but ByteDance and Beijing have demonstrated that they can’t be trusted. Evidence shows how the Chinese government can use the app for cyber-espionage and political influence campaigns in the U.S. https://t.co/dh5D5WO5AK

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 12, 2024

item.title: 来自@WSJopinion：拜登需要在国情咨文中解释为什么世界局势在他的眼皮底下变得如此糟糕，以及他打算如何阻止这种下滑，而不是再次向选民讲述特朗普的缺点。
item.description:
From @WSJopinion: Rather than telling voters, again, about Trump’s shortcomings, Biden needed to explain in his State of the Union why the world situation has grown so dramatically worse on his watch and how he intends to stop the slide, writes @wrmead https://t.co/aeVSAqekuu

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 12, 2024

item.title: 来自@WSJopinion：我们应该仔细考虑欧洲更加自治的后果。@AaronBMacLean 写道：让这些国家自力更生可能只是它们的手伸向彼此喉咙的前奏。
item.description:
From @WSJopinion: We should give careful thought to the consequences of a more autonomous Europe. Putting these countries on their own feet may merely be the prelude to their hands reaching for one another’s throats, writes @AaronBMacLean. https://t.co/iBq0Szzi9G

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 12, 2024

item.title: 苹果公司表示，它将允许欧洲的 iPhone 用户直接从开发者的网站上下载应用程序，这标志着该公司在面对欧盟新的竞争规则时向监管机构作出的又一次让步。
item.description:
Apple says it will allow iPhone users in Europe to download apps directly from a developer’s website, marking another concession to regulators as the company faces new competition rules in the European Union https://t.co/OIqCfmhqKB https://t.co/OIqCfmhqKB

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 12, 2024

item.title: 在一项对驾驶辅助系统进行评估的研究中，特斯拉和福特汽车等几家汽车制造商的成绩不佳
item.description:
Tesla and Ford Motor were among several automakers to receive poor grades in a study that reviewed driver-assistance systems https://t.co/2vxxtFNwkr https://t.co/2vxxtFNwkr

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 12, 2024

item.title: 阿彻丹尼尔斯米德兰公司（Archer Daniels Midland）表示正在接受美国司法部的调查，这进一步加强了对这家农业公司会计实务的审查。
item.description:
Archer Daniels Midland said it is under investigation by the Justice Department, adding to scrutiny over the agriculture company’s accounting practices https://t.co/TQxPg7j2VO https://t.co/TQxPg7j2VO

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 12, 2024

item.title: 您的在线冰箱是黑客攻击的目标吗？您的联网门铃呢？答案是肯定的，但我们有办法保护自己。
item.description:
Is your online refrigerator a target for hackers? How about your internet-connected doorbell? The answer is yes, but there are ways to protect yourself. https://t.co/MyAwOhIGfP https://t.co/MyAwOhIGfP

item.title: 当乔-拜登（Joe Biden）与调查他处理机密材料的特别顾问坐在一起时，总统有很多话要说。访谈记录描绘了他回忆往事和开玩笑的画面。
item.description:

item.title: 来自@WSJopinion：农村共和党人对择校的抵制正在瓦解。现在，只要民主党人能加入进来就好了，@DeAngelisCorey 写道。
item.description:
From @WSJopinion: Rural Republican resistance to school choice is crumbling. Now if only Democrats would get on board, writes @DeAngelisCorey. https://t.co/UIlmyGz3FJ https://t.co/UIlmyGz3FJ

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 12, 2024

item.title: "风往哪儿吹，我们就往哪儿去"。没有债务，坐拥巨额存款，DINKs--"双职工，无子女 "夫妇--正在夸耀频繁旅行、财务自由和慷慨赠与的美德。
item.description:
"We go where the wind blows." Free of debt and sitting on hefty savings, DINKs—"dual income, no kids" couples—are boasting the virtues of frequent travel, financial freedom and generous gifting. https://t.co/6qKvqXRG8y https://t.co/6qKvqXRG8y

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 12, 2024

item.title: 由于准备接收的波音飞机数量比年初计划的要少，航空公司正在减少飞行，并放缓了招聘飞行员和空乘人员的计划
item.description:
Airlines are cutting back on flying and tempering plans to hire pilots and flight attendants as they prepare to receive fewer Boeing planes than they had planned at the start of the year https://t.co/BKUNHv6h0l https://t.co/BKUNHv6h0l

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 12, 2024

item.title: "新面貌》讲述了迪奥和香奈儿在纳粹占领下的巴黎的故事，是最近一波电影和电视节目中的最新一部，聚焦于塑造奢侈时尚的悲剧和不法行为。
item.description:
“The New Look,” about Dior and Chanel in Nazi-occupied Paris, is the latest in a recent wave of movies and television shows focused on the tragedy and wrongdoing that has shaped luxury fashion https://t.co/lVf4QUlYoT https://t.co/lVf4QUlYoT

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 12, 2024

item.title: 在彭萨科拉市，一幢拥有泰坦尼克号房间的海滨住宅以 299.9 万美元的价格上市，房间内设有泰坦尼克号邮轮酒吧的复制品和一个设定为邮轮沉没时间的时钟。
item.description:
In Pensacola, a waterfront home with a Titanic room featuring a replica of the ocean liner’s bar and a clock set to the time the ship sank is hitting the market for $2.999 million https://t.co/pb8jBHUtG4 https://t.co/pb8jBHUtG4

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 12, 2024

item.title: 2024 年 2 月，消费价格同比上涨 3.2%。通过我们的价格跟踪器了解通货膨胀对您经常购买的商品的影响。
item.description:
Consumer prices rose 3.2% in February 2024 from a year before. See how inflation has affected the items you buy on a regular basis with our price tracker. https://t.co/z2eaf7rXsH https://t.co/z2eaf7rXsH

item.title: 石油输出国组织维持其对全球石油需求增长的预期不变，但在通胀下降和预期降息的背景下进一步上调了对今年经济的预期
item.description:
The Organization of the Petroleum Exporting Countries left its estimates for global oil-demand growth unchanged, but raised its economic forecast for this year further amid falling inflation and anticipated interest-rate cuts https://t.co/OxldRFOaNp https://t.co/OxldRFOaNp

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 12, 2024

item.title: OpenAI 回击了埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）对其提起的诉讼，在一份法律文件中表示，公司从未与这位科技界亿万富翁签订过创始协议，并称马斯克的论点 "经常语无伦次"。
item.description:
OpenAI hit back at Elon Musk’s lawsuit against it, saying in a legal filing that it never had a founding agreement with the technology billionaire and describing his contentions as "often incoherent" https://t.co/pTOqOHo5kz https://t.co/pTOqOHo5kz

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 12, 2024

item.title: 新墨西哥州的堕胎诊所为来自红州的妇女扩大和增加了服务。"这里不是德克萨斯"

item.title: 考虑到 1957 年至 1964 年间出生的美国人一生中平均要做十几份工作，因此很容易就会有多个退休账户。所有这些账户应该去哪里呢？
item.description:
It’s easy to wind up with multiple retirement accounts, considering that the average American born between 1957 and 1964 has worked a dozen jobs during their lifetime. Where should all those accounts go? https://t.co/P2TtPHcbrT

— Buy Side from WSJ (@BuySideWSJ) March 10, 2024

item.title: "你知道《驱魔人》里 那个女孩从床上飞起来撞到天花板的场景吗？就是那个场景"乘客们描述了拉塔姆航空公司航班上发生的事情，飞机在半空中突然坠落。
item.description:
“You know in The Exorcist, when the girl flies from the bed and hits the ceiling? It’s exactly that scene.” Passengers describe what happened on board the Latam flight that suddenly dropped midair. https://t.co/asRkAf5tTZ https://t.co/asRkAf5tTZ
